participant_1.background:
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
i have long hair for a boy.
i am a mother of two.
I enjoy the Fourth of July because my favorite color is red, white, and blue.
I'm not sure what my ethnicity is.

participant_2.background:
I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports.
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good! I just dyed my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything. What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! I recently started writing my own songs, and I'm excited to see where it takes me.
That's great! I've always wanted to write my own songs, but I've never been brave enough to try.
It's definitely nerve-wracking at first, but it's so rewarding when you finally finish a song that you're proud of.
I'm sure it is! I might have to give it a try sometime.
I would definitely recommend it! It's a great way to express yourself creatively.
Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm mostly into rock and alternative.
Me too! I love listening to rock music when I'm working out.
Me too! It's so motivating.
It really is! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Killers, The Strokes, and The White Stripes.
Nice! I love The Killers too. I've seen them in concert a few times.
I've never seen them in concert, but I've always wanted to.
They're amazing live! You should definitely check them out if you ever get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem
